title: How many time can you change ur name when u buy summoner name change
body: How many time can you change ur name when u buy summoner name change. After you buy it can change it any time.

replies.body: I don't believe there's a cooldown period to change your summoner name.  Let me know if you run into any trouble!
I think he was asking if his name changes were limited to a certain amount or if he could change it as many times as he wished.
